code: Require Import List Arith Lia (* Nat *).
From Undecidability.Shared.Libs.DLW Require Import utils_tac utils_list sums pos vec.
From Undecidability.H10.Dio Require Import dio_logic dio_elem.
Let convex_2 x p : 2*(x*(x+p)) = x*x+(x+p)*(x+p) -> p = 0.
Fact convex_eq x y : 2*(x*y) = x*x+y*y -> x = y.
intros H; apply convex_2 in H; lia.
intros H; apply convex_2 in H; lia.
Let convex_3 a t x y : 0 < t -> a*x+(a+t)*y = a*y+(a+t)*x -> x = y.
Fact convex_neq a b x y : a < b -> a*x+b*y = a*y+b*x -> x = y.
Fact convex_n_le n (f g : nat -> nat) : ∑ n (fun i => 2*(f i*g i)) <= ∑ n (fun i => f i*f i + g i*g i).
revert f g; induction n as [ | n IHn ]; intros f g.
Let nat_le_sum a b c d : a <= b -> c <= d -> a+c = b+d -> a = b /\ c = d.
Fact convex_n_eq n (f g : nat -> nat) : ∑ n (fun i => 2*(f i*g i)) = ∑ n (fun i => f i*f i + g i*g i) <-> forall i, i < n -> f i = g i.
revert f g; induction n as [ | n IHn ]; intros f g.
intros i Hi; rewrite Hfg; auto; ring.

Inductive dio_polynomial : Set := | dp_nat : nat -> dio_polynomial (* natural number constant *) | dp_var : V -> dio_polynomial (* existentially quantified variable *) | dp_par : P -> dio_polynomial (* parameter *) | dp_comp : dio_op -> dio_polynomial -> dio_polynomial -> dio_polynomial.
Fixpoint dp_var_list p := match p with | dp_nat _ => nil | dp_var v => v::nil | dp_par _ => nil | dp_comp _ p q => dp_var_list p ++ dp_var_list q end.
Fixpoint dp_par_list p := match p with | dp_nat _ => nil | dp_var _ => nil | dp_par x => x::nil | dp_comp _ p q => dp_par_list p ++ dp_par_list q end.

Fixpoint dp_eval φ ν p := match p with | dp_nat n => n | dp_var v => φ v | dp_par i => ν i | dp_comp do_add p q => dp_eval φ ν p + dp_eval φ ν q | dp_comp do_mul p q => dp_eval φ ν p * dp_eval φ ν q end.
Fact dp_eval_ext φ ν φ' ν' p : (forall v, In v (dp_var_list p) -> φ v = φ' v) -> (forall i, In i (dp_par_list p) -> ν i = ν' i) -> dp_eval φ ν p = dp_eval φ' ν' p.
induction p as [ | | | [] p Hp q Hq ]; simpl; intros H1 H2; f_equal; auto; ((apply Hp || apply Hq); intros; [ apply H1 | apply H2 ]; apply in_or_app; auto).
Fact dp_eval_fix_add φ ν p q : dp_eval φ ν (dp_add p q) = dp_eval φ ν p + dp_eval φ ν q.
Fact dp_eval_fix_mul φ ν p q : dp_eval φ ν (dp_mul p q) = dp_eval φ ν p * dp_eval φ ν q.
Fixpoint dp_size p := match p with | dp_nat n => 1 | dp_var v => 1 | dp_par i => 1 | dp_comp _ p q => 1 + dp_size p + dp_size q end.
Fact dp_size_fix_comp o p q : dp_size (dp_comp o p q) = 1 + dp_size p + dp_size q.
Definition dio_single_size (e : dio_single) := dp_size (fst e) + dp_size (snd e).
Definition dio_single_pred e ν := exists φ, dp_eval φ ν (fst e) = dp_eval φ ν (snd e).
Let dp_2xy u v : dio_polynomial nat nat := dp_mul (dp_nat 2) (dp_mul u v).
Let dp_x2y2 u v : dio_polynomial nat nat := dp_add (dp_mul u u) (dp_mul v v).
Let dp_2xy_size u v : dp_size (dp_2xy u v) = 3+dp_size u+dp_size v.
Let dp_x2y2_size u v : dp_size (dp_x2y2 u v) = 3+2*dp_size u+2*dp_size v.
Let dp_common e : dio_polynomial nat nat := match e with | dee_nat c => dp_nat c | dee_var v => dp_var v | dee_par p => dp_par p | dee_comp o v w => dp_comp o (dp_var v) (dp_var w) end.
Let dp_eval_common φ ν e : dp_eval φ ν (dp_common e) = dee_eval φ ν e.
Let dp_left (c : dio_constraint) := dp_2xy (dp_var (fst c)) (dp_common (snd c)).
Let dp_right (c : dio_constraint) := dp_x2y2 (dp_var (fst c)) (dp_common (snd c)).
Let dee2dp_1 l := fold_right dp_add (dp_nat 0) (map dp_left l).
Let dee2dp_2 l := fold_right dp_add (dp_nat 0) (map dp_right l).
Let dee2dp_1_size l : dp_size (dee2dp_1 l) <= 1+8*length l.
unfold dee2dp_1; simpl fold_right; fold (dee2dp_1 l).
Let dee2dp_2_size l : dp_size (dee2dp_2 l) <= 1+12*length l.
unfold dee2dp_2; simpl fold_right; fold (dee2dp_2 l).
Let dc_value_1 φ ν (c : dio_constraint) := 2*(φ (fst c)*dee_eval φ ν (snd c)).
Let dc_value_2 φ ν (c : dio_constraint) := (φ (fst c)*φ (fst c)) + (dee_eval φ ν (snd c)*dee_eval φ ν (snd c)).
Let dee2dp_1_eval φ ν l : dp_eval φ ν (dee2dp_1 l) = fold_right plus 0 (map (dc_value_1 φ ν) l).
Let dee2dp_2_eval φ ν l : dp_eval φ ν (dee2dp_2 l) = fold_right plus 0 (map (dc_value_2 φ ν) l).
unfold fst, snd; do 2 f_equal; apply dp_eval_common.
Let dee2dp_spec φ ν l : dp_eval φ ν (dee2dp_1 l) = dp_eval φ ν (dee2dp_2 l) <-> Forall (dc_eval φ ν) l.
apply Forall_forall_map with (P := fun i => φ (fst i) = dee_eval φ ν (snd i)); auto.
Theorem dio_elem_single l : { E : dio_single nat nat | dio_single_size E <= 2+20*length l /\ forall ν φ, dp_eval φ ν (fst E) = dp_eval φ ν (snd E) <-> Forall (dc_eval φ ν) l }.
unfold dio_single_pred, fst, snd; split; apply dee2dp_spec.
Theorem dio_elem_equation l : { E : dio_single nat nat | dio_single_size E <= 2+20*length l /\ forall ν, dio_single_pred E ν <-> exists φ, Forall (dc_eval φ ν) l }.
destruct (dio_elem_single l) as (p & H1 & H2); exists p; split; auto.
split; intros (phi & H); exists phi; revert H; apply H2.
Corollary dio_rel_single R : 𝔻R R -> { E : dio_single nat nat | forall ν, R ν <-> dio_single_pred E ν}.
destruct dio_formula_elem with (f := A) as (l & _ & _ & Hl).
destruct dio_elem_equation with (l := l) as (E & _ & HE).
exists E; intro; rewrite HE, <- Hl, HA; tauto.
Definition dio_poly_pos m p : (forall x, In x (dp_var_list p) -> x < m) -> { q | forall φ ν, dp_eval φ ν p = dp_eval (vec_pos (fun2vec 0 m φ)) ν q }.
induction p as [ n | v | i | o p Hp q Hq ]; intros H.
specialize (H v); spec in H; simpl; auto.
exists (dp_var (nat2pos H)); intros phi psi; simpl.
exists (dp_comp o p1 q1); intros phi psi; simpl.
Theorem dio_poly_eq_pos (e : dio_single nat P) : { m : nat & { p' : dio_polynomial (pos m) P & { q' | forall ν, dio_single_pred e ν <-> dio_single_pred (p',q') ν } } }.
exists m, p1, q1; intros psi; unfold dio_single_pred.
eq goal Hphi; f_equal; apply dp_eval_ext; auto; intros j _; rewrite vec_pos_set; auto.
Fact dio_poly_eq_pos_equiv n (p q : dio_polynomial (pos n) P) ν : dio_single_pred (p,q) ν <-> exists w, dp_eval (vec_pos w) ν p = dp_eval (vec_pos w) ν q.
intros (w & Hw); exists (vec_set_pos w); eq goal Hw; f_equal; simpl; apply dp_eval_ext; auto; intros; rewrite vec_pos_set; auto.
Variable (V P E : Set) (σ : P -> nat).

Fixpoint dp_inst_par (p : dio_polynomial V P) : dio_polynomial V E := match p with | dp_nat c => dp_nat c | dp_var v => dp_var v | dp_par p => dp_nat (σ p) | dp_comp o p q => dp_comp o (dp_inst_par p) (dp_inst_par q) end.
Fact dp_inst_par_eval φ ν p : dp_eval φ ν (dp_inst_par p) = dp_eval φ σ p.
induction p as [ | | | [] ]; simpl; f_equal; auto.
Variable (V P Q : Set) (f : P -> Q).
Fixpoint dp_ren_par p : dio_polynomial V Q := match p with | dp_nat c => dp_nat c | dp_var v => dp_var v | dp_par p => dp_par (f p) | dp_comp o p q => dp_comp o (dp_ren_par p) (dp_ren_par q) end.
Fact dp_ren_par_eval φ ν p : dp_eval φ ν (dp_ren_par p) = dp_eval φ (fun i => ν (f i)) p.
induction p as [ | | | [] ]; simpl; f_equal; auto.

Fixpoint dp_proj_par p : dio_polynomial V (pos n) := match p with | dp_nat c => dp_nat c | dp_var v => dp_var v | dp_par p => match le_lt_dec n p with left _ => dp_nat 0 | right H => dp_par (nat2pos H) end | dp_comp o p q => dp_comp o (dp_proj_par p) (dp_proj_par q) end.
Fact dp_proj_par_eval φ ν p : dp_eval φ ν (dp_proj_par p) = dp_eval φ (fun i => match le_lt_dec n i with left _ => 0 | right H => ν (nat2pos H) end) p.
induction p as [ | | p | [] ]; simpl; f_equal; auto.
